attributes.action: Pay rises for NHS staff, Police and Fire service
attributes.additional_details: Whilst every right thinking person understands the need for the savage cuts you made when coming to power, YOU are way out of touch with the people on the issue of fair treatment of NHS, POLICE & FIRE SERVICE pay! The one area you should not be challenging especially in light of the suggested pay rises for MP`s is these departments! I intend to start a campaign here to get fair treatment. Why can`t the Police etc go on strike? I intend to raise this matter with the European court of human rights on their behalf as it is a basic right to withhold your labour.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: Pay Rises for key service workers in line with MPs

Created by: Sean Elliott

Closing: 18/03/2015
